channel.title: Java likes throwing null pointers at me >:(
channel.description: Working on a command that accesses a void and it keeps throwing this stupid nullpointer at me. [code=java]java.lang.NullPointerException at server.model.minigames.MyMinigame.RequiredToEnter(MyMinigame.java :26)[/code] and currently at line 26 in MyMinigame.java I had this [code=java]final int miningLevel = c.playerLevel[c.playerMining];[/code] I have fixed like 3 null pointers and they keep coming. Java hates me >:(

item.title: Java likes throwing null pointers at me >:(
item.dc:creator: @RiiPiiNFtW RiiPiiNFtW
item.description:
@RiiPiiNFtW wrote:

Working on a command that accesses a void and it keeps throwing this stupid nullpointer at me. java.lang.NullPointerException at server.model.minigames.MyMinigame.RequiredToEnter(MyMinigame.java :26) and currently at line 26 in MyMinigame.java I had this final int miningLevel = c.playerLevel[c.playerMining]; I have fixed like 3 null pointers and they keep coming. Java hates me >:(

Read full topic
